sentence.Network_en: He smiled, an odd, dreamy smile that sent chills up my back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他笑了，笑容古怪迷离，叫我后背发凉。

sentence.Network_en: How odd life was, how unfathomable, how profoundly unjust.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活多么离奇，多么莫测，多么不公啊！

sentence.Network_en: These odd assertions were interpolated into the manuscript some time after 1400.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些奇怪的论断是于1400年后的某个时间被加入手稿的。

list.abs: ocular 目镜odd pinnate 奇数羽状的odinite 拉辉煌斑岩
odd-pinnate的英语解释:  a leaf shape; pinnate with a single leaflet at the apex  相关短语:  odd pinnate 奇数羽状复叶  odd-pinnate leaf 奇数羽状复叶.
tree with odd - pinnate leaves and racemes of fragrant pink to purple flowers ., 一种奇数羽状叶的树 , 其从粉红色到紫色的芳香花朵成总状花序.
any plant of the genus Amorpha having odd - pinnate leaves and purplish spicate flowers ., 紫穗槐属的任何一种植物 , 具有奇数羽状叶和紫色穗状花.

means.word_mean: 1. a leaf shape; pinnate with a single leaflet at the apex

auth_sentence.content: Distinctively odd, and all the better for it.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Distinctively odd, and all the better for it.

auth_sentence.content: I always used to think he was rather odd.

auth_sentence.content: It seems an odd finale given Herbert's age.
